title: Vaccine Detoxification Treatment
description: Vaccine Detoxification Treatment The vaccination process purposefully activates your child's immune response to a specific virus. As a result your child's immune system is working overtime....
cleaned_text: The vaccination process purposefully activates your child's immune response to a specific virus. As a result your child's immune system is working overtime. Acupuncture and cupping therapy helps strengthen your child's immunity while boosting their energy and overall health. This helps your child prepare and recover from an inoculation. This treatment isn't just for children, the AW vaccination detoxification treatment ,will help you to optimize your preparation, response and recovery to an inoculation. Our immunization specific treatment, which occurs before and again after the immunization process, targets the effect of each vaccination on the body according to Traditional Chinese Medicine pattern identification.
